attributes.review: I opened the app to see what our president looked like, for I was temporarily blind for 4 years and couldn’t see our president. When i was cured, I saw a disgusting cheeto on my screen. This is the most clickbait app EVER!! do not download 🤮🤮
attributes.title: THIS APP CAUSES VIRUSES 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to show my support for President Trump and I try to open it but it froze and won’t let me in unfortunately. Waste of time

attributes.review: This app makes me want to puke. I downloaded because I love trump soooooooOoOOOooOoO much....🤨.... and then nasty smells started coming out of it. I tried to fix it with spray and it didn’t work. It smelled like old man mixed with racism, sexism, etc... I wonder why...

attributes.review: Took a full 93 days to download! As soon as I opened the app Our president started knocking on my door. Saying he would eat my toes! Thankfully the boys had my back on TikTok, and they gave me 1,000,000 likes.
attributes.title: Awful

This app does not have current or trending news it’s very outdated. 
Also, it’s super slow and glitchy.

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, first, I downloaded the app, then, when I opened it, my phone shot this nasty smell out of it, after that, it shot laser beams all over my house and now my house is burned down :/

attributes.review: this app took more than a day to download then made my phone crash instantly 😡😡😡🤮🤮🤮 I’m so upset, all I wanted to do was support my king 🤪🤪😝😋 but i’m just so upset what a terrible and glitchy app. nobody should use it. BEWARE!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app bc I thought it would be a good way to connect with my president and make sure he wins the 2020 election. TURNS OUT HES RACIST???? WHAT???? Is this a man you want to have an app in your store apple? I don’t think so.

attributes.review: This app takes for ever to download it’s been a year. I was trying to support my favorite president. It just finished downloading today and the interface is complicated and so laggy. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
